s2.name: Installation and Users Guide
s2.p: The JORAM documentation is packaged as a single PDF document.

It is well known by the JORAM team that this documentation is not sufficient and sometimes vague or unclear. Do not hesitate to provide any comment or feedback that could help us improving this doc. Of course, any contribution is welcome ;-).
The Old documentation (before 4.1 version) is still accessible here. Since 4.1 the documentation can be downloaded in the download area.

s2.name: Joram Tutorials
s2.p: A growing set of tutorials are now available.

ul.li: For advanced user and programmer a detailed documentation generated with Doxygen is available here.

s2.name: ScalAgent Distributed Technologies
s2.p: ScalAgent is the provider of the open-source platform on top of which JORAM's MOM is built, and proposes complementary information and showcases involving JORAM.
White papers about JORAM are available, in French and in English.
